title: New Guinea election story
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and John Martin-Jones
brief_description: Twenty-one years before achieving their independence, New Guineans were able to vote for a transitional form of representative democracy in 1964. Singular logistical problems - of language, and geography - had to be summited, and this film chronicles that process
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and John Martin-Jones
